대사: @Hmm? It's been a while^ what brings you here.@
@Well^ it's a request. How's ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ?@
@Same as usual.@
@...I'm telling you^ be careful and don't cause any trouble.@
@Sure. This one's no big deal.@
@Anything else?@
@Hmm? I haven't seen you around lately.@
@Yeah^ I haven't had a lot of work lately.@
@Because the mafia and thugs have been quiet lately.@
@What's good is good.@
@Talk to ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ if you have any more questions.@
@What^ you want to help me do my job?@
@It's been a while^ ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ.@
@Oh^ Fabian. It's been a while.@
@I haven't had much work these days. To be honest^ I never thought I'd be racking my brain because things are too peaceful around me.@
@It's easy for you^ you're not going out in the field these days.@
@Well^ that's...~@
@Why^ are you in trouble for bootlegging again?@
@That's there too^ but it doesn't really matter because I'm only going to have to oversee it anyway.@
@So you got caught by the chief again? You got yelled at for your papers last time.@
@I'm not saying it's not^ but...~@
(Then ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ turned slightly serious^ looked around^ and began to whisper in a low voice.)
@You know^ you're not supposed to say it anywhere?@
@Sure. When has information ever leaked out of my end?@
@It is... There's been a string of ⓡ(●2ⓜmissing people)ⓦ recently^ four men and two women.@
@Missing people? Isn't that common around here?@
@Well^ maybe for slum people^ but not this time.@
@They were most middle-class^ solidly employed^ and there was no sign of them going missing. Their families were puzzled.@
@And since the six people who went missing were all men who didn't know each other. Some people thought it was an isolated incident.@
@An unspecified series of ⓡ(missing people)ⓦ... that's unusual.@
@But wait^ I don't think I've ever heard of this before. Don't they put up flyers or something in the newspaper when someone goes missing?@
@That's why I'm whispering. I've been told by my superiors to keep it a secret.@
@Not just to reporters entering the building^ but to the families of the victims.@
@I think there's some sort of mafia connection between that^ but... Oh^ ⓖ(Maeve)ⓦ's gonna be pissed if she hears about it.@
@Isn't there something spooky about this? People disappearing without a trace in the middle of a recent quiet?@
@I'm just letting you know to be careful^ so don't do anything stupid. If I get caught doing this^ I will be disciplined.@
@Okay^ okay^ don't worry.@☆①
@Anything else?@☆①
@Did you see the article this morning? It said the stars are aligned.@
@I saw that in the paper^ too^ but it wasn't particularly interesting.@
@That said^ we do have a lot of ⓡ(insomniacs)ⓦ in our office.@
@Isn't that just because you work late nights?@
@Oh^ I see.@
@Have you seen ⓖ(Maeve)ⓦ lately?@
@No^ we're in the middle of a crackdown. I'm sure she'll be a nuisance. Say hello to her when you see later.@
@Yeah.@
@I'm not sure about that.@
(A stern policeman. He don't like me that much.)
(Flexible police officer^ who have helped me before.)
(ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ^ a friend and competent police officer.)
(He's a good guy^ except he's a little bit of a womanizer.)
@Damn it^ ⓖ(Albert)ⓦ^ you know what I saw in the sewers by the ⓑ(river)ⓦ today?@
@There were humans walking around with giant fish eyes!@
@Hahaha... Fabian^ no^ that's not it. That sewer ⓡ(ghost story)ⓦ is a pet alligators^ not a human with fish eyes.@
@I saw it with my own two eyes.@
@You...~ You're not drinking in broad daylight because you don't have a request these days^ are you?@
@If you saw something^ That must be a ⓖ(●1ⓦsewer worker)ⓦ.@
'He don't believe a word I'm saying.'
@I've heard of that one. I've gottencalls asking if it's real until recently.@
@So what's the reality.@
@Fabian... That's not possible in real life. Of course it's a ⓡ(●2ⓢrumor)ⓦ..@
@About half a year ago^ we were digging under the sewers to check for smuggling routes^ and it's not a alligator-friendly environment.@
@There's been a ⓡ(fishy smell)ⓦ in the city lately. Have you heard?@
@I can't tell you how many times we've gotten calls about it.@
@Have you found the cause yet?@
@Well...@
@It's a small number^ but it's something that people on the outside know about.@
@But it's probably best not to get too deep into it.@
@I recently found out during my research that there is a ⓡ(nightmare)ⓦ epidemic in Arkham.@
@ⓡ(nightmares)ⓦ? Now dreams are contagious too?@
@I don't know exactly either^ but the doctor said that there have been a lot of people complaining of similar ⓡ(nightmares)ⓦ lately.@
@Most people report ⓡ(nightmares)ⓦ involving the ocean or water.@
@It's summertime^ which means a lot of exposure to water^ right?@
@I think that's why there are relatively more water-related ⓡ(nightmares)ⓦ.@
@That's what I thought at first^ too^ but then I realized that the patients' conditions didn't make sense.@
@Hmm^ that's weird.@
@Remember that ⓡ(fishy smell)ⓦ you've been getting lately?@
@Yeah^ why?@
@I looked into it and it seems to be related to ⓖ(sewer workers)ⓦ. Do you have any idea?@
@ⓑ(sewer)ⓦ side and...? Are you sure about that?@
@The person who smelled the ⓡ(fishy smell)ⓦ said it came from a ⓑ(sewer)ⓦ worker.@
@Um... I'll talk to the top of the organization^ because they've been having trouble with that^ too.@
@Some of my subordinates also care about it too.@
@I see... Let me know if you find out anything more while researching.@
@Of course.@
@Have you heard that ⓡ(river water quality)ⓦ has been weird lately?@
@What^ like someone's been sneaking factory wastewater into the river?@
@No^ it's actually cleaner^ except for the fishy smell.@
@So what's good is good... oh wait.@
@Hmm? Why?@
@Come to think of it^ that ⓡ(●1ⓕfishy smell)ⓦ is circulating in the city.@
@I got a lot of complaints about that... and some people saying it was a corpse or something.@
@Well^ Arkham can do that.@
@Hmm. Maybe there's a connection between this ⓡ(●4ⓕfishy smell) and the ⓑ(sewers)ⓦ.@
@Hmm... something doesn't feel right...@
@Have you heard that ⓡ(river water quality)ⓦ has been weird lately?@
@What^ like someone's been sneaking factory wastewater into the river?@
@No^ it's actually cleaner^ except for the fishy smell.@
@a ⓡ(fishy smell)ⓦ..@
@Right? Isn't it weird?@
@It's a guess^ but I think it's the ⓡ(fishy smell)ⓦ that's been circulating in town^ coming from the ⓑ(sewers)ⓦ.@
@Sounds like me too...  Will you look into it?@
@I'm thinking about it.@
@Okay^ let me know if there's anything I can do to help.@
@I saw Maeve for the first time in a long time.@
@I haven't seen him much lately due to work^ so how is she doing?@
@It's the same as usual. More than that^ remember the ⓡ(planetary parade)ⓦ in the newspaper article last time?@
@Maeve says how about going to see an astronomical show on the night of the 14th ⓑ(Miscatonic University)ⓦ. What do you think?@
@Let's see... it's not an on-call day^ so no problem.@
@So we'll get together that day?@
@ⓡ(●2ⓟYeah^ yeah)ⓦ.@
@I came across some ⓖ(sewer workers)ⓦ who said they were unfairly fired.@
@Hmm? Well^ that's not so new in today...@
